athena:
Single muon 100 GeV MuonSlice-single muon larged0, pu EventMax=15000 TrigInDetValidation/TrigInDetValidation_RTT_topOptions_MuonSlice Trigger/TrigValidation/TrigInDetValidation TrigInDetValidation long # include "samples/TrigInDetValidation_mu_sample8.xml"
RttLibraryTools ExeRunner
exeName TIDArdict.exe
exeParamString TIDAdata11-rtt-larged0.dat -f data-muon.root -p 13 -b Test_bin_larged0.dat
RttLibraryTools ExeRunner
exeName TIDArun.sh
exeParamString data-muon.root data-mu_single_mu_larged0_PU-reference.root HLT_mu6_idperf_InDetTrigTrackingxAODCnv_Muon_FTF HLT_mu6_idperf_InDetTrigTrackingxAODCnv_Muon_IDTrig -d HLTEF-plots
RttLibraryTools ExeRunner
exeName TIDArun.sh
exeParamString data-muon.root data-mu_single_mu_larged0_PU-reference.root HLT_mu6_idperf_InDetTrigTrackingxAODCnv_Muon_FTF -d HLTL2-plots
